text: Interferon regulatory factor 2 binding protein 2 is a protein that in humans is encoded by the IRF2BP2 gene. ==Function== This gene encodes an interferon regulatory factor-2 (IRF2) binding protein that interacts with the C-terminal transcriptional repression domain of IRF2. Alternative splicing results in multiple transcript variants encoding distinct isoforms. == References == == Further reading == * * * * * * *
title: IRF2BP2 (gene)
